body: Question is right there in the title I don't think I need to add anything else.
body_tagged: Question is right there in the title I don't think I need to add anything else.
title: Any specific guidelines to making a LFT post?

replies.body: No, just talk about yourself and why a team would want you. Keep it brief and simple.
replies.body_tagged: No, just talk about yourself and why a team would want you. Keep it brief and simple.

replies.body: No, but you should add info like; age, timezone, position, previous teams on Avicus and ocn, discord tag or skype name, so they can contact you.
replies.body_tagged: No, but you should add info like; age, timezone, position, previous teams on Avicus and ocn, discord tag or skype name, so they can contact you.

replies.body: make sure you're looking for a team
replies.body_tagged: make sure you're looking for a team
